Product description

Color:Black

Why is the Zegur Carry On Garment Bag the Best-Selling Garment Bag on Amazon?

Why is it a Must-Have for Business Trips or Weekend Getaways?

Traveling Is Supposed to Be Fun, Who Wants to Waste Time Ironing?

Whether it’s for business or pleasure, we all love taking the opportunity to travel and explore
the world. But when you pack your clothing in a standard suitcase, you arrive at your
destination to find wrinkled shirts, creased pants and a crumpled suit.

Travel Like Never Before! Keep Clothes Clean, Neat and Wrinkle-Free with the Carry On Garment Bag by Zegur!

Thanks to an interior dual buckle, clothes arrive in perfect condition, ensuring that you look
professional for meetings or interviews.

Measuring 23”x 22”x 4” when folded (43”x 22”x 4” when open), this incredible bag holds
up to three suits or dresses with plenty of room left for belts, shoes, ties and toiletries. We
even added an exterior pocket, providing easy access to electronics or travel documents.

Lightweight and Comfortable: Who Wants to Lug a Heavy Suitcase?

Our bag attaches to your luggage for portable convenience! With a top carrying handle and
an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap, it’s versatile, great on the go and fits in all large
overhead storage bins!

Unisex Design: The Classic Look Is Great for Men and Women!

An elegantly imprinted full interior lining shows that we’re dedicated to offering style and sophistication.

Lasts for Years: Waterproof Material Makes Our Bag Amazingly Functional!

Constructed from fray-resistant 1800D Polyester, our bag is EVA foam padded and features
durable zippers for years of enjoyment.

It’s the Perfect Gift for Your Loved One!

Try Risk Free with Our Money Back Guarantee! Take Advantage of Our Limited Time Low Offer Price and Order Today!

Question:
Is this bag small enough for a carryon or does it have to be checked?
Answer:
2 standards. Each airline has a standard carry on bag size AND a foldable garnet bag size standard

American Airlines current policy for “foldable garmet bag” is 51” total inches with length, width, and height. … see more 2 standards. Each airline has a standard carry on bag size AND a foldable garnet bag size standard

American Airlines current policy for “foldable garmet bag” is 51” total inches with length, width, and height.

This bag totals 49” total inches; making it an acceptable carry on garmet back as of today, for Americans airlines.

Stick to the facts and check your airlines garmet bag carry on size allowance. see less 2 standards. Each airline has a standard carry on bag size AND a foldable garnet bag size standard

American Airlines current policy for “foldable garmet bag” is 51” total inches with length, width, and height.

This bag totals 49” total inches; making it an acceptable carry on garmet back as of today, for Americans airlines.

Stick to the facts and check your airlines garmet bag carry on size allowance.
By Beezer on September 27, 2018

Question:
Ordered garment bag didn't have strap. Where can I get a strap?
Answer:
The strap should be inside the large pocket on the back. If it is not there you can go to the product page where you ordered it and click on the sellers name, it should be highlighted. Then there should be an option to ask the seller a question and if you let them know that there was no strap they should send you one.
By Timothy Ramsey on March 11, 2018

Question:
Do you believe this bag can handle checkin twice a month for a year?
Answer:
I think the material of the outer layer of the bag can probably handle being tossed around in an airplane, but the zippers and such on the inside of the bag will depend on how rough you treat it. I don't think the zippers are of the highest quality but they should still last if you don't treat them too roughly.
By Jeff Yifu Chen on November 10, 2017

R. Self
5.0 out of 5 starsIt has many nice features! It has 4 inside pockets that hold ...
February 22, 2017
Color: BlackVerified Purchase
I purchased this for my teenage son who travels with an acapella choir and needs to keep his suit, vest, shirt and ties clean and neat.
I am very impressed with this garment bag! It has many nice features!
It has 4 inside pockets that hold things like his socks and shoes. The mesh pocket is great for his ties and bow ties; he can see immediately which one he needs. Three of the inside pockets zip completely closed while the 4th pocket has a small square of velcro in the center top; which works for his size 14 shoes. The toes of his shoes stick out the top, but the center velcro keeps the shoes from falling out of the pocket.
The main compartment has a 3 loop holder at the top for hanging hangers. There are three straps to secure the clothes and the middle strap is padded to help reduce wrinkles when the bag is folded in half.
The outside pocket is very large and will easily hold a laptop or tablet. It also has many pockets for accessories, like pens & pencils, cellphone, charger, business cards, etc.
It comes with a longer shoulder strap (which was detached and found in the big outside pocket). It has a metal chain and hook for hanging in a closet or from a door. It also has a place for an indentification tag so you can label your bag with your name and contact information.
This bag has been a wonderful way to keep his performance clothes is great condition! We both love it!
